DOC.brief_summary: This investigation consist two parallel group participant follow protocol . The aim study investigate effect use Functional Electrical Stimulation/Ankle Foot Orthosis ( AFO ) splint assistive mobility device 12 week period people MS experience foot drop . Patients clinically prescribe FES invited participate FES arm study . Patients clinically prescribe AFO invited participate AFO arm . Participants ask make four visit gait laboratory Queen Margaret University . Four week start device use ( Baseline - 4 week ) , start device use ( Baseline ) , 6 week 12 week device use . Participants ' walking assess use computerise three dimensional motion analysis , provide detailed description movement ( kinematics ) low limb . Participants also ask carry 10 metre walk two minute walk . Both gait analysis walk performance test carry without assistive deviceÍ¾ apart first session participant assess without assistive device . Participants ask wear activity monitor 7 day assessment . In addition participant ask complete four short standardise questionnaire ( MS walk scale , MS impact scale ( MSIS-29 ) , Fatigue severity score Leeds MS Quality life score ) assessment .
DOC.brief_title: Walking With FES AFO People With MS With Foot Drop
DOC.criteria: People diagnose Multiple Sclerosis Prescribed either AFO FES treat drop foot physiotherapist age 1875 Unable walk 10 meter Bilateral device use Breastfeeding pregnant
